com.rivieracode.realm

Class LoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.appserv.security.AppservPasswordLoginModule
      • com.rivieracode.realm.LoginModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.enterprise.security.common.AppservPasswordLoginModuleInterface, LoginModule

    public class LoginModule
extends com.sun.appserv.security.AppservPasswordLoginModule
    Implements a Glassfish specific JAAS authentication module as defined: Oracle Creating a Custom Realm.

    Note : the LoginModule class must extend the abstract class AppservPasswordLoginModule instead of javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule which is suitable for JASPIC client only.

    Author:
    Jean-Michel Tanguy
